name: Rocket Launch (Ben_Lc)
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move left and right

Description: This is an action game where you pilot a rocket leaving earth and have to guide it through an asteroid field to safety.

This is my 4th game i have made so any improvements/suggestions would be grateful.

I hope you enjoyed playing and can see how much time and effort i put into making this.  :)
